description: Samaneh Alavi Institute is the first international and specialized center for music and performing arts of the Caucasus (Turkish-Azerbaijani) in collaboration with the countries of the Caucasus, with two branches in the country.
concert_desc: Live music and dance performances with international artists.
album_desc: Producing professional-quality albums and music videos with international collaboration.
certificate_desc: Issuing local, international, and instructor certificates.
hall_desc: Equipped hall for concerts, workshops, and special events.
galleryDescription: In this section, you can view special moments from concerts, workshops, and events at Saman Alavi Academy.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
